text:
The link to login page supplied with the default publication says "Login as
Editor" and then takes you to a page which suggests that "lenya/levi" would be a
good combination. In fact the user "lenya" is not an editor, but merely a
contributor (or a similar type of user). A more correct user to log in as for
editor rights is "alice/levi". Alice is an editor, but not a contributor. 

Suggested fix: Both default users should be listed on the login page, or none at
all.
creator: alex@owal.co.uk

text:
I also encountered this problem some time ago.

The problem becomes worse because one default user *is* mentioned. Because of
this I did not expect that another important default user exists.
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
agallardo@agsoftware.dnsalias.com
text:
I meet the same problem while I was starting in lenya. Since the triviality of
this bug, we can fix it in 1.2.1. Why wait for 1.4?
